title: Ditching Bad Friends & Bad Mothers
description:
Friends should lift each other up, not bring each other down. This week Camo and Tasia explain why they are coming to peace with cutting ties with the people in their lives who are no longer serving them. The two reflect on how beneficial it has been for them to set boundaries with others and focus on personal growth. They talk about motherhood and the importance of caring for your children and as always they end the episode answering your fan submitted questions!
Go to GoodAmerican.com/UNFAZED and use code UNFAZED at checkout for $50 off your first pair of jeans!
Find your perfect place at Apartments.com
